> <OLD>
>
> Hydras smiled in ambigus way and say "I'm Hydras... Predacon commander"

<NEW>

MAX-B, the larger soldier that stood head and shoulders above
everyone, except SCORPOK turned to look at HYDRAS as he spoke, his
massive shoulder cannon turning to orient on HYDRAS, "Roger?" He said
curiously.

"No no." HELLSCREAM said as he placed a calming hand on MAX-B's
shoulder. "No need to shoot him, he just doesn't know."

Even THRUSTOR and DIRGEGUN looked visably taken aback as HYDRAS
proclamied his leadership over the PREDACONS.

JHIAXUS leaned in to HYDRAS and was about to say something when
THRUSTOR turned to look at him, "What are you doing over there, no
talking!" His voice was a bit shrill, but there was no mistaking the
intent.

HELLSCREAM smiled wickedly as he took a step towards HYDRAS, "So you
are the Predacon commander?" he said as he looked him up and down with
an appraising look. "You might do." He chuckled as he spoke.

Gesturing to DIRGEGUN and THRUSTOR, HELLSCREAM nodded "let's take
these three, there is someone that will want to meet them."

It is then that HYDRAS might note that all of them are wearing
PREDACON insignias.

(TAG)

- Preston
